name: cyubeVR
description: Immerse yourself in an infinite, procedurally generated world in a voxel game exclusively designed for VR. Explore, gather resources, craft in 3D and build anything you have in mind. Featuring beautiful graphics, a fully dynamic day/night cycle and dynamic weather.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i7 3xxx, Intel i5 8xxx or Ryzen 5 Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD R9 390 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i7 5xxx or Ryzen 7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
